In this unit, students will: 

  • Write systems of two linear equations and solve the systems by graphing, substitution, and elimination.
  • Solve linear inequalities in one and two variables.
  • Graph the solution set of linear inequalities in two variables and systems of two linear inequalities in two variables on the coordinate plane.

To accomplish these unit-level learning goals, students will complete the following lessons and activities.
